value:
Prince Alfonse and Princess
Sharena are such close siblings...
I'm pretty jealous.

Michalis...Minerva...I wish we
could all live together again...

Be sure to take breaks sometimes!
And if you ever get hurt, I'll take care
of you, $Nu.

Will you go on a walk with me?
Anna says I'm too young to go
out alone.

This castle is big! We should play
hide-and-seek.

I bet you're the one here called
$Nu, right?$k$pI'm Maria. I just came to say hello!

Just one more step to being as
strong as my brother!

I'm getting as powerful as my
sister—bit by bit!

I can't be a burden—I need to be
even stronger!

I'm Maria, and I'm a real princess
from Macedon. I'll do my best to
help everyone, so keep me nearby!

Heeheehee! What do you think—
the strongest I've been yet,
right?$k$pMy siblings have always protected
me, and I knew someday I had to be
strong enough to protect myself.$k$pBut you've helped me realize that
"someday" isn't good enough!
I need to be strong now.$k$pFighting is no fun, but I think it's
why I've gotten as strong as I have.$k$pThanks for helping me realize my
dream!
Someday I want to grow up big like my sister.
Wait! Have more time to talk?
I'll stay with you. I can, right?
